explanation: [0-0] On a city road, a young man in a black shirt and black jeans is holding a newspaper in his right hand. Behind him are a few young men, one with a purple and yellow bicycle next to him. In the distance, there's a row of black railings and a yellow brick building.

[0-4] Then, the young man in black starts performing magic, slowly levitating in mid-air and opening the newspaper in his hand. The camera then pans to the left, showing a black man in a black shirt, black pants, and orange shoes, standing in front of a blue bicycle, watching the man performing magic.
